dryRun.description: See what commands would be run, without committing to git or updating files.

noVerify.description: Bypass pre-commit or commit-msg git hooks during the commit phase.

skipRootChangelog.description: Skip root CHANGELOG generation containing all monorepo changes (only with sync mode).

skipProjectChangelog.description: Skip project CHANGELOG generation (only with sync mode).

version.description: Manually increment the version by that keyword.

preid.description: Use the next semantic prerelease version with a specific prerelease identifier.

versionTagPrefix.description: Version tag prefix. Defaults are 'v' and '${target}-' for sync and async modes.
